Malice:

His face resumed its normal appearance and his grin dropped to a scowl.  He had almost drained the field of its operational power.

"You'd believe any lie I could tell you.  Explains why you're just a follower!"

He modified and discharged the energy he had drained back into the barrier to overload it and force it down.  He stepped through the doorway and looked Myrmidon straight in the optic.

"Get out of my way, follower. I have to go do the job you fools refuse to do."
